arts.ttl: Flick talks Gavi, Fermin, Bernal, Szczesny ahead of Rayo Vallecano vs Barcelona – ‘His heart belongs to Barça’
arts.sum: Barcelona will be aiming to record their third win of the 2025/26 season when they take on Rayo Vallecano away at Estadio de Vallecas on Sunday night. arts.ttl: Barcelona star ruled out of Rayo Vallecano clash with injury
arts.sum: A member of the midfield ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona will play no part in the club’s upcoming meeting with Rayo Vallecano. That’s according to Blaugrana insider Javier Miguel,…

arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona 21-year-old star withdraws from national team squad
arts.sum: Following the statement from FC Barcelona confirming that Gavi was ruled out of tomorrow’s La Liga game against Rayo Vallecano, the Spanish Football Federation has confirmed his withdrawal from the national team squad. arts.ttl: Flick hopeful Barcelona teenager can be registered ahead of Rayo Vallecano clash
arts.sum: FC Barcelona play their third La Liga game of the season on Sunday night when they take on Rayo Vallecano away from home at Estadio de Vallecas. arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona midfielder ruled out of Rayo Vallecano clash with ‘discomfort’
arts.sum: Amid concerns surrounding the injury suffered by midfielder Gavi in training on Friday, FC Barcelona have now issued an official statement providing an update on the situation.
